Description: Conversion-focused landing pages optimized for campaigns.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form captures campaign goal and assets.
2. Auto-create project for design tasks.
3. Portal for client review of mockups.
4. Publish and test page; integrate tracking.
5. Final approval triggers campaign launch tasks.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Portal, Make (page builder sync), ActiveCampaign

Description: Setup of tracking codes and pixels across platforms.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form collects site/platform details.
2. Task checklist for code placement.
3. Make sync to deploy pixels in CMS.
4. Verify data in SuiteDash dashboard.
5. Portal confirmation report shared.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Dashboards, Make (deploy pixels), Google/FB Ads

Description: Collect and manage user-generated content campaigns.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Create SuiteDash form for UGC submissions.
2. Auto-create task to review each submission.
3. Approved UGC stored in portal folder.
4. Automated notifications to clients of new content.
5. Monthly UGC report delivered.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Forms/Files/Portal, Make (content moderation AI), ActiveCampaign
